name: Epic Jigsaw Puzzles
description:
Epic Jigsaw Puzzle is the best jigsaw puzzle game, with a wide range of high definition pictures from different niches for you to relax and solve them.

There is a wide range to select from, ranging from animals, nature, architecture you name it. These puzzles are suitable for young kids and adults just by selecting the difficulty of the puzzle.

Features:
- Free daily updated puzzle gallery
- High-definition puzzles!
- Create puzzle with your own picture and share with friends or with the Magic Jigsaw Puzzles community!
- 5 difficulty levels to choose from : start your journey as a beginner to become the grand master!
- Work on more than one puzzle at a time and see your progress
- Preview the finished puzzle to help you solve it
- Large collection of puzzles with animals, paintings, nature landscapes, portraits,etc
- Simple controls that make it easy to solve puzzles!
- Fun rebuses for both adults and young kids

Share your puzzles with your friends or with the Sympo Games community on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/SympoGames/?view_public_for=2280102438672233

*The game does come with ads but can be removed with an inApp purchase to "Remove Ads'.*

Follow us on social media to keep up to date with the our latest updates and games through our website at www.sympogames.com
